hourly_azkar.text_en: There is no god but Allah
Glory and praise be to Allah
Glory be to Allah, the Almighty
I seek forgiveness from Allah, the Almighty

hourly_azkar.text_ar: لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله
hourly_azkar.text_en: There is no power or strength except with Allah

hourly_azkar.text_ar: اللهم صلِّ وسلم على محمد وآله وصحبه
hourly_azkar.text_en: O Allah, send blessings and peace upon Muhammad and his family
Allah is sufficient for me, and He is the best Disposer of affairs
